abstract: Riyad H Mansour, Palestinian ambassador to United Nations, submits papers for Palestinians to join treaty creating the International Criminal Court, paving way for the tribunal to potentially investigate serious crimes on Palestinian lands committed by either side in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
lead_paragraph: The court could potentially investigate serious crimes on Palestinian lands committed by either side in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
snippet: The court could potentially investigate serious crimes on Palestinian lands committed by either side in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Palestinians Submit Papers to U.N. to Join International Criminal Court
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Submit Documents to Join an International Court
